msbt.message: Other homes never smell the same as your own, .It's like the scent of a home gives you clues about the owner The clue I'm getting here is"cheese."
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your looks super comfy.<20_2 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hey, I get it. If you wanna be the world champion, you have to get your rest!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Let's catch some at your place sometime. I bet we'd have fun watching together, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice !What kind of music do you like? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like stuff with a good beat that I can pump iron to, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh! It's !I'm supposed to do 200 sit-ups now!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="6" />Oh well When I get home, I'll just do 400 to make up for it, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I see you've got a plant in your place, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> I didn't know about your nurturing side.That's pretty cool, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What a great way to rinse away all the sweat after a big tournament, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That's a really sweet .Looks awesome for, like, resting your head on, or practicing deadlifts <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Lots of things, really! .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="3" />I hope you're not just SITTING in your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You can do so much more! Like strength training, or stretches, or planks, or squats, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? I didn't know you played. I'm kinda jealous!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've tried to learn an instrument a few times, . It's really hard!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You cook? That's awesome. A good meal is the best thing for getting major gains, ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I cook all the time! Um Making protein shakes in a blender counts as cooking, right?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, eh? <20_3 arg="6" />How're your gains? Are they, um<20_2 arg="3" />gainful?I hope you're getting away from the machines now and then. Gotta mix up your workouts to get truly built!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!The outdoors-y look really highlights your physique, ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hey! Wanna go boulder lifting?
<20_2 arg="10" />Whoa! <20_2 arg="9" />I am REALLY loving your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Think I could get you to light my next weightlifting competition?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Aha! So THAT's why you look so ripped, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You spend all day posing in front of your , don't you?I know I would

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your 's really nice!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hey, you ever tried stuffing all your clothes in there so you can do heavy squat lifts with it?<10_4 /> M-me neither

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, I didn't know you had a pet. What is this little guy? Is it ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Bugs are crazy strong, so I'm always trying to steal their moves for new workouts, .I usually don't have enough limbs to really pull it off, though.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Question for you. Ever seen a fish sleep? Like your fine friend the here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Answer for you. They don't sleep! Imagine thatâ€”24 hours of swimming a day. Think of the cardio gains

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh yeah, putting one of these out gives off a classic vibe. It's , yeah?<20_3 arg="3" />If I close my eyes, it's almost like I'm living in ancient times I'm a cave with huge biceps
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! Look at you with !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />, maybe I need to step up my game at the home dojo

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Say, that looks pretty heavy I'm talkin' about your big ol' there.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Why didn't I think of decorating like this? It's a mega workout every time you rearrange things, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, hey! I didn't know you were a collector. I'm talking about your there!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't know much about art, but you must be pumped to have something famous like that in your room!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ooh, I'm jealous. Nothing like cooling off after a super-hard workout with <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Just don't cool down TOO quickly. I got an ice-cream headache in my biceps once.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ooh, I didn't know you had !<20_3 arg="3" />Your place feels so relaxing with that in here I'm getting sleepy<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" />Whoa! I can't nap yetI haven't lifted!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! You've got my picture displayed like I'm in the Hall of Fame, !<20_3 arg="6" />II can't even tell you how much this means to me. I don't think we're rivals anymorewe're teammates!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Heeeythat's not gym equipment. Are you playing with ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's cool! You can't ALWAYS be working out, . Gotta pump up those fun gains too!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hmm. So you're interested in , huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think I could design a workout based on that. Maybe even a sport! Some kind of hybrid

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So how do you decide to decorate with something like your here?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Me, I'm always looking at pure functionality. I have a little poem I like to remember "If muscles flex and overload, credit to the item owed, it belongs in my abode."
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I really like where you've placed your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But does it cramp your style for indoor at all? Asking for myself.
